Address.label: Address
Address.value: 125 S. WACKER DRIVE,SUITE 1500, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60606, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FreightCar America Inc is a diversified manufacturer of railcars and railcar components in North America. The company design and manufacture a broad variety of freight cars including covered hoppers, open-top hoppers, gondolas, intermodal, and non-intermodal flat cars that transport numerous types of dry bulk and containerized freight products. Its Manufacturing segment includes new railcar manufacturing, used railcar sales, railcar leasing, and major railcar rebuilds and generates revenue from the same.
